topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598e22c6368727d0e000934#post_5598e22c6368727d0e000934
My grandmother wasn't quite so overtly bad. 
She mostly just acts like a 2 year old. 
I swear, there were multiple times we didn't get something EXACTLY RIGHT from the store and she'd throw a fresking tantrum
And when my mom refused to put up with her shit, my grandmother would call her mother and my aunt and say my mom was abusing her and that there wasn't any food in the house 

Oh and last year she kept not taking her medication and winding up in the hospital because my cousin was getting married and taking away all the attention from my grandmother. Afterward ( about a day or two after the wedding) she had the gall to call my cousin and leave a message saying "I'm healed! Praise Jesus it's a miracle!" 
For reference, her getting sick was definitely not a coincidence. my grandmother is basically a drug addict, she would normally never miss a single pill. 


And on the topic of college, I want to take art classes but I also want to learn something I could definitely make a career out of, Y'know?

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598e5af6368720151000043#post_5598e5af6368720151000043
God...

That does sound like a mess. I take it she doesn't live with you guys anymore? 

Also I know exactly what you mean! Its actually the reason I want to go to Art School.

My goal (If I do really go) is to get better with my Art and than learn Animation and Game Design.

I want to start a game/animation Company. Its a stretch. But eh I can dream!

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598e7e163687278a00013bb#post_5598e7e163687278a00013bb
Yeah, nah, she gone. She's living with her own mom (who she can't stand) 

^~ALSO sorry for bumming you out with stories of my horrible grandma~^


And that's what I wanna do as well but I wanna make sure I have a backup. I never want to stop making art but animation or comics can be kind of a hard career to get in to. 

Game design would probably not be as hard though considering the state of the industry at the moment. And hell, even if the industry crashes there'll always be indie games. Plus the last crash didn't last particularly long anyway.
